Type.Name: SizeFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SizeFunc(out int width, out int height);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Function to let a user of the library specify the SVG's dimensions

remarks.para: width: the output width the SVG should be
height: the output height the SVG should be user_data: user data
